en_UK.description: Highway entrance towards Lausanne/Geneva/Italy or Neuchatel/Biel

comments.comment: I started a few trips from here, it never took longer than 15 minutes to be picked-up. The road is 2 lines and not very busy, a car can easily stop. The police station is just the opposite side of the road so beware (never had any problem though).
